CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1946, pg. 15, reads: "The Know-How - Pie Traynor, sportscaster for Station KQV shows these youngsters at the Kay Boys Club how he used to hit when he was the star third baseman of the Pittsburgh Pirates not so long ago. Traynor has been rated by experts as one of the greatest third sackers in modern baseball. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Harold Joseph "Pie" Traynor holding pool cue as a bat, facing three boys, one wearing plaid coat, in Kay Boys Club
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Traynor, Pie, 1898-1972.Kay Boys' Club (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Baseball players--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
